content.question: An adult with a healthy sleep cycle is most likely to enter REM sleep in which of the following ways?

choices.label: after the dream stage is completed
after cycling through the NREM sleep stages
soon after falling asleep and then remain there for the majority of the night

content.answer: after cycling through the NREM sleep stages

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
